name: Avoidance (Reservoir)
description:
We're Reservoir Games!

  *     *     *  

A dead-end job, a chance of escape, a compromise, a betrayal...

  *     *     *  

This game was made in Ink and Unity for Ink Jam 2018.

This is our first game ever, and was made in less than two days from scratch!!! Only the first scene was ready to submit but it just about holds together... We didn't exactly reach our stretch goals, but it was super fun to make ^^

WATCH THIS SPACE for a new and improved version with LITERALLY LOADS more game!
